name: Ext_R2_MedicationAdministration_status
title: Cross-version Extension for R2.MedicationAdministration.status for use in FHIR R4
description: This cross-version extension represents MedicationAdministration.status from http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/MedicationAdministration|1.0.2 for use in FHIR R4.

element.definition: Will generally be set to show that the administration has been completed.  For some long running administrations such as infusions it is possible for an administration to be started but not completed or it may be paused while some other process is under way.
element.comment: `MedicationAdministration.status` maps to R4 `MedicationAdministration.extension`. Has no type mapping Changed from a single value to an array (max cardinality from 1 to *). `extension` removed the required value set binding to `http://hl7.org/fhir/ValueSet/medication-admin-status`. So is mapped as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget. Element `7352` maps to R4 `13917`
element.isModifierReason: This extension is a modifier because the target element MedicationAdministration.status is flagged IsModifier

element.definition: Will generally be set to show that the administration has been completed.  For some long running administrations such as infusions it is possible for an administration to be started but not completed or it may be paused while some other process is under way.
element.comment: `MedicationAdministration.status` maps to R4 `MedicationAdministration.extension`. Has no type mapping Changed from a single value to an array (max cardinality from 1 to *). `extension` removed the required value set binding to `http://hl7.org/fhir/ValueSet/medication-admin-status`. So is mapped as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget. Element `7352` maps to R4 `13917`

binding.description: A set of codes indicating the current status of a MedicationAdministration.
